((There gathering what they can from the Ark and rebuilding from Square one 
which is the base Frame of a ship. Besides I clear my actions on the repair 
with Yanshosh besides I'm the only one that really cares about the shape of 
the Ark so I thought it would be a waste of posting to type my exact actions 
unless some request a run through.If you want run through just say so.))

::?1-6 minus ?3 continue rebuilding the ark::

::3?::
?3 Continues to patorl the area.

::Koj and Inu drop off the requested supplies::

::?3::
?3 quickly sets up the shield generators to stablize the defense grid.

::?1::
Ok with the bulk head screws we can continue work on the frame. Start 
releasing Fireballs to fuse a some metal together.
